messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] specialty and international  homeschooling websites
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Sandra, there are some cool sites here.  I checked them all out and found the following: The review link after the Inspirit link, has a page not found
messages.messageBody:
Hey Sandra, there are some cool sites here. I checked them all out and
found the following:

The "review" link after the "Inspirit" link, has a page not found message,
but says to try "eho.org" which is the next link you mention.

Under contacts for UK and Europe, the specifically "Europe" link is not
found.
And "Choice in Education" has a page cannot be displayed message.

"Scout School" has moved. Both "Scout School" and "Campfire" are at the
same site, now.

HTH,

Robin B.
----- Original Message -----
From: <SandraDodd@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 12, 2003 7:50 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] specialty and international homeschooling
websites


> I've just amended Australian entries on the webpage below and was hoping
> maybe some of you who have some extra time cold go to this page and see if
> you know of good things to add, or see if you find outdated or non-working
> things, or other errors or ideas for improvements. Maybe you'll find
> something you needed to know! OR maybe, since synchronicity has already
come
> up once this morning, you'll find something someone else will need to know
> within the next few days and you'll have the info right at hand!
>
>
> http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingotherwise
>
>
> Thanks.
>
> Sandra
>

messages.subject: specialty and international  homeschooling websites
messages.msgSnippet: I ve just amended Australian entries on the webpage below and was hoping maybe some of you who have some extra time cold go to this page and see if you know of
messages.messageBody:
I've just amended Australian entries on the webpage below and was hoping
maybe some of you who have some extra time cold go to this page and see if
you know of good things to add, or see if you find outdated or non-working
things, or other errors or ideas for improvements. Maybe you'll find
something you needed to know! OR maybe, since synchronicity has already come
up once this morning, you'll find something someone else will need to know
within the next few days and you'll have the info right at hand!


http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingotherwise


Thanks.

Sandra
